Package com.didisoft.pgp.net

Network clients for accessing OpenPGP Key servers

See: Description

  • Class Summary 
    Class Description
    HKPClient
    Retrieves keys from HTTP/S HKP key servers
    Check for details: https://tools.ietf.org/html/draft-shaw-openpgp-hkp-00

    Example usage:
    LDAPClient
    Retrieves keys from LDAP servers that support the pgp ldap schema

    Example usage:

Package com.didisoft.pgp.net Description

Network clients for accessing OpenPGP Key servers

This package provides client classes for accessing LDAP and HKP OpenPGP Key servers
